Flow.description: Adding a new "IDX Subdomain Name Check" Task creation when the Service Status equals "Subdomain Review".

formulas.name: forFinalQADate
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.RecordType.Name}, "Website Launches", {!for2BDays}, "Property Website", {!for1BDay}, "Design Refresh",{!for1BDay}, "Template Change",{!for1BDay}, "Platform Migration", {!for2BDays}, {!for1BDay})

formulas.name: forSubTemplateDescription
formulas.expression: "Please build Sub-Template for "+ {!$Record.Name} +" on the following domain " +{!$Record.Website_Domain__c}

Flow.label: LP - Agent Subdomains Service Updated

value.stringValue: Please review that all requirements needed are available to proceed with the build-out.
Revisions for Sub-Template have been submitted, please complete at your earliest convenience.
Revisions for Subdomains have been submitted, please complete at your earliest convenience.
Subdomain draft has been approved - please initiate build process for all subdomains
Subdomains ready for launch, please QA and launch

recordUpdates.description: Updates the website date in the primary contact related with the account
recordUpdates.name: Contact_Update_Website_Date
recordUpdates.label: Contact - Update Website Date

recordUpdates.description: Updates the website date in the primary contact related with the account
recordUpdates.name: Contact_Update_Website_Date2
recordUpdates.label: Contact - Update Website Date

recordUpdates.name: Last_Task_Assigned_WB_Team_Lead
recordUpdates.label: Last Task Assigned - WB Team Lead

recordUpdates.name: Last_Task_Assigned_WB_Team_Lead_1
recordUpdates.label: Last Task Assigned - WB Team Lead

textTemplates.name: bodyCancelled
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, {!$Record.Name} has been moved to Cancelled.

textTemplates.name: bodyCreateSubdomains
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, Confirming that the team is currently creating all subdomains in accordance with the approved draft for {!$Record.Name}. Please expect this to be complete within 3-4 business days.

textTemplates.name: bodyFeedbackRound
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, Your sub-template Revisions Round, {!$Record.Name}, is complete! Please review ahead of scheduled call with client.

textTemplates.name: bodyNew
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName},
You have been assigned a new subdomain service,{!$Record.Name}. Please schedule your welcome call in 4-5 business days.

textTemplates.name: bodyReadyToLaunch
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, Confirming that {!$Record.Name} has been moved to Ready to Launch Please expect the subdomains to be live within 1-2 business days.

textTemplates.name: bodyRevisionRound
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, Confirming that your sub-template draft, {!$Record.Name}, is currently going through Revisions. Please expect this to be complete within 3-4 business days.

textTemplates.name: bodySubdomainReview
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, Your sub-template Revisions Round, {!$Record.Name}, is complete! Please review ahead of scheduled call with client.

textTemplates.name: bodyWaitingOnBrand
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, {!$Record.Name} has been moved to Waiting on Brand Website status. Once ready, please move this service to Draft in Progress.

textTemplates.name: bodyWDReview
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, Your new sub-template draft, {!$Record.Name}, is complete! Please review ahead of scheduled call with client.

textTemplates.name: bodyWebsiteDraft
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName},
Your new subdomain draft, {!$Record.Name}, is currently being built, please reach out to the client to schedule a welcome call and change the service status in Salesforce.

textTemplates.name: bodyWebsiteLaunched
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, {!$Record.Name} has officially launched. Please notify the client.
